alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 11:59PM CDT until June 12 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Haskell County in west central Texas... Northern Jones County in west central Texas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Old Glory, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sagerton around 1210 AM CDT. Rule around 1215 AM CDT. Haskell around 1240 AM CDT. Paint Creek around 1250 AM CDT. Avoca around 1255 AM CDT. Stamford, Lueders and Lake Stamford Marina around 100 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Us- 380 Near The Haskell-Stonewall County Line and Tuxedo. Those attending !**EVENT/VENUE NAME OR LOCATION*! are in the path of this storm and should prepare for IMMINENT DANGEROUS WEATHER CONDITIONS. SEEK SHELTER NOW! TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
